title: Web 3 and the Future of Money: Research & Strategic Insights
oneLiner: Strategic analysis of Web3, blockchain, and DeFi shaping next‑gen finance.
description: A comprehensive research and presentation analyzing the transformational impact of Web3, blockchain, DeFi, and the metaverse on currency and banking, with strategic opportunities and risks.

title: Intelligent Patient Data Registry & Clinical Decision Support (Emergency Department)
oneLiner: System design for ED data registry with AI‑assisted triage and alerts.
description: End‑to‑end system modeling for capturing, organizing, and analyzing ED patient data with an AI assistant for risk signals, medication reminders, and treatment suggestions; HL7/FHIR‑aligned design.

title: ERPNext Deployment & Scenario-Based Demonstration
oneLiner: Hands‑on deployment and live walkthrough of ERPNext on Ubuntu VM.
description: Installed and configured ERPNext on Ubuntu (VirtualBox), localized, set RBAC, and demonstrated interconnected modules through a predefined business scenario.

title: Smart Librarian – Intelligent Library Management System
oneLiner: Full‑stack library management with analytics dashboards.
description: Django‑based library system with search, lending/return/renewal workflows, role‑based access, and Chart.js analytics; RUP‑structured delivery.

title: Personal Portfolio — Modern, LLM‑Augmented Developer Site
oneLiner: Theme‑aware portfolio rebuilt with an integrated LLM chat assistant.
description: Modular React + SCSS rebuild with light/dark theming, animated sections, JSON‑driven content, and an LLM assistant (OpenRouter) with spam rules and quick actions.

title: AI-Powered Digital Health Assistant (In Development)
oneLiner: Conversational health assistant with search‑augmented intelligence.
description: Co‑developing a privacy‑respecting agent with persistent context, real‑time knowledge retrieval, and onboarding UI for long‑term wellness engagement.

title: InsideForge (In Development)
oneLiner: Blending code, intelligence, and insight — details under wraps.
description: An ambitious platform in the making, pushing how programming knowledge is transformed, documented, and explored.

title: HealthAgent — Personalized AI Wellness Coach (In Development)
oneLiner: Adaptive fitness, nutrition, and wellness plans via an AI agent.
description: Collects essential metrics, understands goals, and generates evolving plans for weight loss/gain/maintenance with secure handling of sensitive data.

title: Country–City–Language Data Warehouse & Analytics
oneLiner: Relational DW with ETL and analytical SQL queries.
description: Integrated CSV datasets into PostgreSQL with foreign keys and indexes; built analytical queries for demographic and linguistic insights.

title: Google Play Store Data Analysis & Interactive Dashboard
oneLiner: ETL + PostgreSQL + Streamlit dashboard for app analytics.
description: Cleaned Kaggle data, designed normalized schema with indexes, built CRUD API, and delivered an interactive Streamlit dashboard with filters and charts.

title: Advanced RAG-based Conversational AI for Persian Language
oneLiner: Persian‑optimized RAG with FAISS/BM25 and Streamlit UI.
description: End‑to‑end RAG pipeline for PDFs with FAISS vector search, BM25 re‑ranking, and Aya‑Expanse LLM integration; reference‑backed answers.

title: Diabetes Risk Prediction — End-to-End Supervised Learning Pipeline
description: Built a supervised ML pipeline with engineered health indicators, multiple models (LR/Ridge/SVM/Tree/Forest), PCA, and cross‑validated metrics.

title: Customer Segmentation via Unsupervised Learning & Clustering Analysis
oneLiner: K‑Means, hierarchical, and density‑based clustering at scale.
description: Prepared and engineered features for 38k+ customers; compared clustering methods with Silhouette/ARI/Purity; 3D visualizations.

title: Research Trend Identification via Text Mining & Clustering
oneLiner: Mining abstracts/keywords (2018–2024) to reveal evolving themes.
description: Term extraction, time‑based trend mapping, and clustering to surface topic evolution across major journals.

title: Distributed Twitter Hashtag Trend Detection with Apache Spark & Hadoop
oneLiner: Multi‑node cluster to rank trending hashtags via hybrid scoring.
description: HDFS + Spark jobs on a 4‑node cluster; frequency, engagement, and hybrid methods; passwordless SSH and static IP setup.

title: NYC Taxi Data Analysis with Delta Lake & PySpark — End-to-End Lakehouse Pipeline
oneLiner: Colab‑based Delta Lake pipeline from raw to analytics.
description: Built a Lakehouse flow with Delta Lake + PySpark: ingestion, cleaning, enrichment, and analytics.

title: Industrial IoT Lakehouse Pipeline with Kafka, Spark, Iceberg, and Superset
oneLiner: Real‑time IoT pipeline from Kafka to Superset dashboards.
description: Kafka ingestion, Spark Structured Streaming transforms, Iceberg tables on MinIO, Dremio querying, and Superset dashboards.

title: Complex Network Analysis & GNN Performance Evaluation
oneLiner: NetworkX metrics → PyG GNNs; how topology impacts learning.
description: Analyzed Random/Scale‑Free/BA/Evolving networks, then trained GCN/GAT/GraphSAGE for node classification; compared accuracy/F1 across topologies.
